message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'll really like. I'm asking for $95 for it.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $75 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $85. This is a fair price considering the value of the product for you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $85 is still a bit above my budget. I can offer $80, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. Can you meet me at that price?
